name: A
description: Add 1 doom token to the doom track for each investigator with 3 Dark Pacts.

name: A
description: The investigator(s) with the least Power gain 1 Power, even if he does not have a Dark Pact. Note, however, that an investigator needs a Dark Pact to spend Power.

name: A
description: The first player chooses an investigator. That investigator must take a Dark Pact if able. If not able, that investigator is devoured.

name: A
description: For each investigator with a Bound Ally, raise the terror level by 1.

name: B
description: The investigator with the most Power moves to the Other World of his choice (ties broken by the first player).

name: B
description: Each investigator with a Soul Pact gains 1 Power for each point of Sanity he currently has. He then reduces his maximum Sanity by 2.

name: B
description: Each investigator with a Blood Pact gains 1 Power for each point of Stamina he currently has. He then reduces his maximum Stamina by 2.

name: D
description: Each investigator with a Dark Pact gains 1 Power per Dark Pact he has.

name: D
description: For each 3 Power possessed by the investigators as a group, add 1 doom token to the doom track (round down).

name: D
description: The investigators must choose: either each investigator with Power must discard a Common or Unique Item, or add 1 doom token to the doom track.

name: D
description: Each investigator with a Bound Ally must discard all of his money and items.

name: F
description: Each investigator with a Dark Pact draws 1 Spell.

name: G
description: Each investigator with a Dark Pact must discard 1 Gate trophy or 5 toughness worth of monster trophies or 5 Clue tokens, if able. If he cannot, he must discard all his monster trophies and Clues.

name: H
description: If every investigator has 1 or more Dark Pacts and/or 1 or more Power, add a doom token to the doom track.

name: H
description: Draw the next 2 Reckoning cards from the deck and resolve them both, one at a time in the order drawn.

name: H
description: The investigator with the most Power is devoured (ties broken by the first player). If no investigators have Power, there is no effect.

name: I
description: Each investigator with only 1 Dark Pact must immediately choose and take a second Dark Pact.

name: L
description: Each investigator may choose to immediately gain 1 or more Dark Pacts. Then, if there is at least 1 investigator who does not have a Dark Pact, each investigator who does have a Dark Pact reduces his maximum Stamina by 1.

name: M
description: Each investigator with 1 or more Power tokens in Arkham is delayed. Each investigator with 1 or more Power tokens in an Other World is lost in time and space.

name: P
description: Each investigator with at least 1 Power gains 1 Power.

name: P
description: Each investigator loses 1 Sanity for each Power he has.

name: P
description: Each investigator loses 1 Sanity or 1 Stamina for each Power he has.

name: P
description: Each investigator loses 1 Stamina for each Power he has.

name: P
description: The investigators must choose: either the investigator with the most Power is devoured, or the investigator with the least Power is driven insane.

name: S
description: Each investigator that has a Dark Pact but does not currently have a Blood Pact loses 2 Stamina.

name: S
description: Each investigator may choose to gain one or more Dark Pacts. Then, if there is at least one investigator who does not have a Dark Pact, each investigator who does have a Dark Pact is Cursed.

name: S
description: Each investigator with a Bound Ally must discard 3 Clue tokens. For each investigator that fails to do this, increase the terror level by 1.

name: S
description: Each investigator that has a Dark Pact but does not currently have a Soul Pact loses 2 Sanity.

name: T
description: Each investigator with a Blood Pact loses 2 Sanity.

name: T
description: A gate opens and a monster appears in each unstable location containing an investigator with 1 or more Dark Pacts (if there is not already a gate in that location).

name: T
description: Each investigator with a Soul Pact loses 2 Stamina.

name: T
description: Each investigator with a Dark Pact loses 1 Stamina per Dark Pact he has.

name: T
description: Each investigator with a Blood Pact is devoured. The new investigator chosen to replace him starts with a Blood Pact and 3 Power tokens in addition to his other fixed possessions.

name: T
description: Each investigator with a Soul Pact is devoured. The new investigator chosen to replace him starts with a Soul Pact and 3 Power tokens in addition to his other fixed possessions.

name: T
description: Each investigator with at least 1 Spell gains 1 Power.

name: T
description: Each investigator with a Dark Pact loses 1 Sanity per Dark Pact he has.

name: T
description: Each investigator may choose to immediately gain 1 or more Dark Pacts. Then, if there is at least 1 investigator who does not have a Dark Pact, each investigator who does have a Dark Pact reduces his maximum Sanity by 1.

name: T
description: Every investigator in Arkham with 1 or more Power is drawn through the closest open Gate (his choice if there is a tie).

name: T
description: Each investigator with 2 or more Dark Pacts must immediately return all of his gate trophies face down to the bottom of the pile of gate markers.

name: T
description: Discard 1 Ally from the Ally deck for each Bound Ally card in play. For each Ally that you cannot discard (because the deck is empty), increase the terror level by 1.

name: U
description: Shuffle the Reckoning deck and its discard pile together (including this card), then draw a new Reckoning card.

name: U
description: If the total Power possessed by the investigators as a group is greater than the total number of investigators in the game, increase the terror level by 1.
